title: Euromoney Ranks Citi Latin America as Market Leader for Trade Finance
summary: Miami, Fla. - Citi Latin America took the top spot in Euromoney's Trade Finance Survey, which recognizes the leading providers of trade finance products and services. Citi ranked number one in 11 categories, including Market Leader for Trade Finance in Latin America, Brazil and Paraguay; Best Service for Trade Finance in Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay; Best Overall Trade Finance Service, Best Advisory Service, Best Digital Offering, Best Market Insight, and Best Support and Advisory Services in Latin America.
tag-1: Euromoney Ranks Citi Latin America as Market Leader for Trade Finance
tag-3: Miami, Fla. – Citi Latin America took the top spot in Euromoney's Trade Finance Survey, which recognizes the leading providers of trade finance products and services. Citi ranked number one in 11 categories, including Market Leader for Trade Finance in Latin America, Brazil and Paraguay; Best Service for Trade Finance in Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay; Best Overall Trade Finance Service, Best Advisory Service, Best Digital Offering, Best Market Insight, and Best Support and Advisory Services in Latin America.
tag-4: "To be ranked number one in Trade Finance services in Latin America by clients is a prestigious honor," said Steve Donovan, Citi Latin America Treasury and Trade Solutions Head. "In the last two years, we have seen a major upswing in our trade finance business in the region as companies increasingly seek to leverage our solutions to deliver growth and resilience across their supply chains. This recognition is validation for the great work of our team and the investments Citi has made to support our clients."
tag-5: Euromoney surveyed more than 11,000 consumers of trade-finance services to rank and assess their top providers. The survey is designed to provide information on the global trade finance market and the opportunity to rank trade finance providers across a selection of categories as rated by their clients.
tag-6: Trade service clients have embraced Citi's digital capabilities, with around 90% of high-volume clients using the CitiDirect BE® platform to initiate transactions, including commercial and standby letters of credit and bank guarantees.
tag-7: Citi was named the World's Best Digital Corporate/Institutional Bank in Latin America by Global Finance in 2020. Citi also won 24 additional awards in the region, including awards for its digital trade finance services.
